TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN HONDA HAS HIGHER EARLY MARCH SALES
TEXT.BODY: <American Honda Motor Co Inc> said its domestic sales for the first 10 days of March totaled 4,394 as compared to 3,786 a year earlier. It said year-to-date sales rose to 52,143 from 31,686 last year. Reuter
